name: 3 (three) Natural Bar Soap - 90g + Toast
description:
description
Natural Sex is a bar soap that will offer you all the special care that your intimate region needs and deserves.

Nourishes and protects your skin so that you are protected, safe and comfortable all day. Free of aggressive ingredients found in common soaps.

Promotes natural asepsis, purifies, moisturizes and eliminates odors. Totally formulated for feminine, masculine intimate hygiene and also indicated for a perfect and safe anal intimate hygiene.

Common bar soaps can unbalance the pH of your intimate area, in addition to causing irritation and even vaginal dryness.

Natural Sex has several advantages compared to ordinary soap, since it is softer and totally suitable for the hygiene of the intimate region. Its formulation contains Melaleuca oil, Barbatimão extract and Arnica.



Know more:
Tea tree oil

Melaleuca belongs to the botanical family Myrtaceae (same as jabuticaba) and among its best known and studied species is Melaleuca alternifolia, culturally valued due to the medicinal potential of the oil taken from its leaves, known to be antibacterial, antifungal, antiviral, anti- inflammatory and analgesic.

Barbatimão

Barbatimão known for its therapeutic activities as healing, bactericidal and fungicidal; it has astringent properties that are due to chemical compounds called tannins.

Ally against candidiasis. Some studies suggest that it inhibits the growth of Candida albicans, a fungus that causes candidiasis, which can affect both the oral cavity and the vaginal region, generating symptoms of candidiasis. This occurs due to the action of tannins on the integrity of the yeast cell wall, affecting and inhibiting its growth in the body.

Arnica

Arnica is a highly regarded plant in the ancestral medicines of European peoples and, nowadays, also in modern phytotherapy.
The healing properties and benefits that arnica brings to our body have been known for many centuries and are increasingly considered by modern medicines. What attracts in arnica is its anti-inflammatory potential, proven to be effective, in addition to its established use as a healing agent. It is also recognized for its antiseptic and analgesic, tonic and stimulating actions.



Characteristics:
It is hypoallergenic and gynecologically tested.

Ideal pH, helps to strengthen your natural defenses.

It does not irritate or harm intimate skin like ordinary soaps.

Contains tea tree oil and barbatimão extract.

Formulated for perfect intimate hygiene of the male, female and anal genitals.

Its use is unisex.


How to use:
With the body wet, apply the soap on the sponge or directly on the skin massaging gently until you get a light foam. Rinse well.



Precautions:
External use.

Keep out of the reach of children.

Do not expose to the sun or temperatures above 50º C.

Protect the eyes during application, in case of contact with the eyes, rinse them with plenty of water.

Do not use if the skin is irritated or injured.

In case of irritation, discontinue use and seek medical attention.



Composition:
Talow and Orbignya oleifera seed oil and Sodium Hidroxide and Sodium Chloride and Aqua and Glycerin, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Aqua, EDTA Dissodium, Sucrose, Alcohol, Stryphnodendron adstringens Bark Extract, Arnica Wild Flower Extract, Tea Tree Oil, Parfum.

Allergenic Components:

Benzyl Benzoate, Citrolnellol, Eugenol, Geraniol, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Limonene.



Fragrance:
Melissa.



Source:
Brazilian industry.

Esse kit é composto por um shampoo e um sabonete de Mirra, pesando de 120 g cada. A media varia de 6 a 7 cm de comprimento, 5 cm de largura e 3 cm de altura.
O Sabonete e Shampoo Veganos de Mirra, são feitos manualmente, sem ingredientes de origem animal na sua formulação. Sem parabenos, sulfatos, sem corantes artificiais e sem derivados do petróleo.

No cabelo a Mirra hidrata, estimula o brilho e controla a oleosidade. Na pele é antisséptica, cicatrizante, antibacteriana e rejuvenescedora.

Na composição desse kit usamos: Azeite de Oliva, Alcool Cetílico, óleo de Mirra, Óleo semente de Uva, Saponária, Óleos de Cúrcuma, Xilitol, Palma, Babaçu ,Cupuaçu, Cinzas e Argila roxa.

São 100% naturais e feitos artesanalmente, onde até as cores, vem de aditivos da natureza como: beterraba e Argilas Roxa.

Nossos Shampoos, são feitos pelo Cold Process: Processo 'a frio. Como não são submetidos a temperaturas elevadas, as propriedades da Mirra e de todos ingredientes, são preservados. O resultado sem dúvida é: vitalidade, nutrição, hidratação, saúde natural e sem agressão. O Cold Process é uma técnica milenar, carregada de sabedoria e lindas histórias dos nossos ancestrais.

Modo de usar: Passe na cabeça, como se estivesse passando na pele.
O processo de adaptação dos fios, vai depender do tempo e quantas vezes fizer uso do produto, afinal, o cabelo precisa ser desintoxicado.
Por isso, embaça seu cabelo com naturalidade por um bom tempo, que o resultado será brilho, balanço, liberdade e naturalidade dos fios.

Seja ético(a) e use o que é correto.

Leve o aroma do campo para sua casa, descubra algumas riquezas do Vale do Ribeira e ame sua pele e seus cabelos cada vez mais.

Nossos produtos são produzidos na mata, no meio do segundo pulmão do Brasil. Totalmente inspirados na Mata Atlântica e pensados o tempo todo em você.
Amarre na naturalidade e seja extremamente feliz.

name: Liquid Soap For Psoriasis, Dermatitis And Eczemas.
description:
Descrição
PsoriSkin : Sabonete líquido.
A Psoríase é uma doença crônica inflamatória da pele, caracterizada por lesões avermelhadas e descamativas na pele, cotovelos e joelhos, que afeta de 2 a 3% da população mundial, causando impacto na qualidade de vida. Como não existe a cura para a psoríase, é recomendado alguns cuidados específicos, para redução da gravidade das lesões. Considerando isso, a equipe Paris Cosméticos, traz um SABONETE LÍQUIDO, ampliando a linha PsoriSkin que já é composta por: Shampoo, Condicionador e hidratante corporal. Que possui uma composição específica, para os cuidados com a psoríase. Assegura: HIGIENIZAÇÃO, CICATRIZAÇÃO e PROTEÇÃO para a pele. Previne sensibilidade e assegura limpeza da pele sem causar ressecamento. . Cuida das lesões, devido a sua ação anti-inflamatória e ainda combate infecções bacterianas e impede o crescimento de fungos. Benefícios: Auxilia no tratamento da psoríase (Indicação principal) Assegura limpeza da pele sem causar ressecamento; Possui ação anti-inflamatória; Combate o crescimento de fungos e bactérias. MODO DE USAR : Aplicar na pele e massagear até produzir espuma. Deixar agir por 1 minuto e enxaguar bem. Uso diário. Após o banho. Aplicar o hidratante PsoriSkin .

PSORISKIN reúne extratos naturais de aloe vera, calêndula e própolis que têm funções hidratantes, cicatrizante anti-inflamatória, antibiótica e foto protetora de modo que o combate a psoríase e peles muito ressecadas tornam-se mais eficaz e por isso assertivo.
EXTRATOS GLICERINADOS QUE POTENCIALIZAM A AÇÃO DO PRODUTO:
Extrato Glicerinado de aloe vera, extrato Glicerinado de calêndula, extrato Glicólico de própolis, Extrato Glicerinado de aveia.

FUNÇÃO DE CADA EXTRATO NA SUA PELE:

EXTRATO Glicerinado DE ALOE VERA ou (Babosa) :
Possui ação anti-age, anti-inflamatória, antimicrobiana, antioxidante, cicatrizante,
Coagulante, emoliente, energizante, hidratante, lubrificante, nutritiva, queratolítica e umectante.

EXTRATO GLICERINADO DE CALÊNDULA:
O Extrato de Calêndula possui ação ante edematosa, anti-inflamatória, antimicrobiana, antioxidante, antisséptica, aromatizante, cicatrizante, condicionante e revitalizante, calmante e refrescante.
EXTRATO GLICERINADO DE PRÓPOLIS:
O Extrato de Própolis possui ação cicatrizante, Anti-inflamatória, bactericida, protetora, regeneradora de tecidos, calmante.

EXTRATO GLICERINADO DE AVEIA:
O Extrato Glicerinado de Aveia apresenta atividade emoliente, hidratante, nutritiva, restauradora de tecidos, remineralizante, suavizante, amaciante, fungicida e condicionante. Possui ação abrasiva, além de contribuir para arquitetura e resistência do tecido conjuntivo. Utilizada em dermatites, seborreias, urticárias, eczemas, peles envelhecidas ou com tendência de formação de rugas

Sulfur soap is very popular in Brazil to treat some skin problems. It is made from sulfur, a mineral with anti-inflammatory, astringent, antibacterial and more.

Benefits:
- Helps fight folliculitis;
- Exfoliation of the skin;
- Decreases the oiliness of the face skin;
- Decrease in inflammation;
- Treatment of blackheads and pimples;
- Cleans deeply;

Doubts:

1. Does the sulfur soap lighten the skin?
Dermatologists claim that pathophysiology does not confirm this property of him. For her, the soap only exfoliates the place, it does not lighten.

2. Is sulfur soap good for folliculitis?
As we mentioned above, it helps to fight folliculitis, because folliculitis is an inflammation and sulfur has anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties.

3. Sulfur soap removes melasma?
The soap does not lighten skin spots. The treatment of melasma must be done with the supervision of a doctor and products indicated by him.

4. Does sulfur soap cure ringworm?
The soap has a poor effect on fungi. It acts more efficiently against bacteria. Therefore, sulfur does not fight ringworm.

5. Can sulfur soap be used to treat white cloth?
The white cloth is a type of fungus, so the soap does not act directly on the treatment, but it helps. In addition to other products indicated by the dermatologist, the soap works by balancing changes in the bacterial flora of the skin.

6. Can the sulfur soap be used on children?
It is not suitable for children, as sulfur changes the bacterial flora of the skin. And in the infant phase, it is very important for protection.

name: Floral Lemon Soap Vegetable 180g Madressenza
description:
Descrição
Com espuma rica e cremosa, o Sabonete Vegetal Floral Lemon Madressenza é elaborado com base pura vegetal possuindo um aroma refrescante de um floral frutado combinado no mesmo produto criando um perfume exótico e suave que irá envolver sua vida em pureza e emoção. Com perfume discreto estimula os sentidos e proporciona vitalidade ao corpo e mente. Traz alegria, bom humor e otimismo. Com saída cítrica de limão e bergamota, possui corpo amadeirado de cedro, com toques floral e fixação de sândalo e almíscar. Produzido com glicerina, manteiga de karité e amido vegetal para proporcionar a pele um sensorial aveludado e sedoso, este sabonete é indispensável para um banho perfumado e delicioso. São produzidos de forma artesanal, cunhados e embalados manualmente.

Sobre o Sabonete Vegetal Floral Lemon por Madressenza

São os mistérios dos sentimentos, intenso, sereno, incerto e essencial que nos fazem sentir a vida e viver quem realmente somos, instigando-nos com os segredos da alma, as descoberta do ser e os profundos desejos de nos tornarmos únicos e desejáveis.
Estamos ligados a uma quantidade de laços emocionais e sentimentais tão complexos que a harmonia e o equilíbrio são encontrados nos detalhes. Os sentidos são a porta de entrada para os estímulos da emoção e dos sentimentos, passando do visual ao olfato, transmitindo a tradição o estilo e a filosofia de uma vida simplesmente encantadora.

Especificações do Sabonete Vegetal Floral Lemon por Madressenza

Com um aroma refrescante de um floral frutado combinados, a essência Floral Lemon da Madressenza cria um perfume exótico e suave, capaz de nos envolver em pureza e emoções. Apesar de exótico seu perfume é discreto, estimulando os sentidos proporcionando vitalidade ao corpo e mente, inspirando a alegria, o bom humor e o otimismo.
O sabonete Vegetal Floral Lemon é produzido com glicerina, manteiga de karité e amido vegetal.

Notas Olfativas: Com saída cítrica de limão e bergamota. Possui corpo amadeirado de cedro, com toques floral e fixação de sândalo e almíscar.

Modo de usar: Aplicar sobre a pele úmida ou com o auxílio de esponja, massagear suavemente. Enxaguar bem.

name: Natural Soap Buriti And Sweet Orange 115g - Ares De Mato
description:
Descrição
Características do Produto – Ingredientes Naturais
Tipos de Pele – Pele Seca ou Ressecada
Gênero – Unissex
Volumetria – 115g
descricaoml – O Sabonete Natural de Buriti e Laranja da Ares de Mato é hidratante e forma uma espuma macia e cremosa que confere suavidade no ato da limpeza. É formulado com óleo vegetal de buriti que tem uma excelente atividade antioxidante, rico em Carotenoides, substâncias responsáveis pela produção de vitamina A.
Possui uma sinergia de óleos essenciais que promovem aumento da elasticidade da pele e diminui o ressecamento, oferecendo um toque macio e aveludado. Com aroma do óleo essencial de laranja doce cítrico-frutado, fresco, leve e envolvente. Doando calma, relaxamento e bem-estar.

Características
• Produto Natural, Artesanal e Vegano
• Hidratante, Regenerador e Antisséptico
• Antioxidante
• Embalagem Biodegradável
• Volume: 115g

Indicações
O Sabonete Natural Buriti e Laranja Doce da Ares de Mato é indicado para todos os tipos de pele.

Ingredientes
Óleo Vegetal Orgânico Elaeis Guineensis: usado principalmente como agente condicionador da pele-também podem ser usado como agente de aumento da viscosidade.
Óleo Essencial de Laranja Doce: Estimula a produção de colágeno e o processo de regeneração da pele. É hidrante, antisséptico e protege contra ressecamento.
Óleo Essencial de Cravo: Analgésico e Antisséptico, tem ação também contra fungos e bactérias.
Óleo Essencial de Patchoulli: Tem propriedades fortalecedoras e regenerativas que auxiliam na cicatrização e rejuvenescimento da pele.
Composição: Elaeis Guineensis Oil* (óleo de palma), Helianthus Annus Oil (óleo de girassol), Aqua, Elaeis guineensis Kernel Oil (óleo de palmiste), Sodium Hydroxide, Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil (óleo de buriti), Ricinus Communis Oil (óleo de mamona), Citrus Aurantium Oil (óleo essencial de laranja doce), Dolomite, Pogostemon Cablin Oil (óleo essencial de Patchouli), Eugenia Caryophyllus Oil (óleo essencial de cravo), Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract (oleoresina de alecrim).
*Verde: ingredientes orgânicos

Fórmula livre de: parabenos, liberadores de formol, corantes e fragrâncias sintéticas, conservantes sintéticos, sulfatos e produtos de origem animal. Não é testado em Animais.

Modo de Uso
Aplique o Sabonete Natural de Buriti e Laranja da Ares de Mato sobre a pele molhada fazendo movimentos circulares. Enxágue em seguida. Pode ser utilizado diariamente.

Precauções
Havendo irritação suspenda o uso, não usar sob a pele ferida. Em caso de contato acidental com os olhos, lavar com água abundantemente. MANTER FORA DO ALCANCE DE CRIANÇAS. Conservar em local fresco. Uso externo. Não ingerir.

description
WHY BUY AT W3 LIFE?

WE ISSUE FISCAL NOTE ON ALL SALES!

STILL IN DOUBT?
Check out the opinion of those who have already bought with us! Just click on “See more data from this seller” below the green reputation bar.

______________________________________________________________

Taking care of the skin is not an easy task, however there are many products created to make the skin of the face and body more beautiful and healthy, among which we can highlight the mastic soap. It is indicated by several dermatologists to treat pimples, as it is very efficient and less aggressive than other treatments. The aroeira is a plant of Brazilian flora rich in tannin that works as an astringent on the skin and mucous membranes. The mastic closes the pores and fights spots, whiteheads and blackheads.

Aroeira soap makes the skin drier and free of impurities, renewing it. The mastic soap can also be used to fight inflammation, wounds that are difficult to heal, wrinkles, wounds, chilblains, itches and cracks. Aroeira soap also has a tonic, stimulating action, treats uterine infections and is also antioxidant.

Composition: Aqua, Orbignya Oleifera seed Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Carbonete, Sucrose, Schinua Terebinthifolius leaf extract
_____________________________________________________________

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

1 - Is the merchandise available for immediate delivery?
A: All goods are for prompt delivery.

2 - What is the shipping cost for my zip code?
A: You can automatically calculate on the right side of the screen, below the product price, by clicking on “Calculate delivery time”. There will appear the deadline and the amount of freight to the informed zip code.

3 - Why do you say it's free shipping and you're charging shipping?
A: Mercado Livre changed its free shipping policy, inserting several variables for the calculation of freight such as product weight and size, in addition to the distance between seller and buyer. Thus, purchases over R $ 99.00 will not always have free shipping. We remind you that shipping is calculated automatically by Mercado Livre and we have no control over its value.

4 - How are deliveries made?
A: Deliveries are made via the carrier and the tracking code is attached to the details of your purchase by Mercado Livre. In some cases the tracking may be invalid due to a technical error between the carrier and Mercado Livre, however you will be able to track the shipment by the purchase details.

5 - Can the product be removed?
A: Yes. All of our products can be removed from our address, which will be informed by chat after purchase. Ask in the field of questions you wish to withdraw with us so that we can enable this option.

6 - Can you create an ad with several different products that I would like to buy all together?
A: You can buy all the desired products from our store by adding them to the shopping cart, so you only pay one shipping and we ship them all together. Just copy and paste the link below to access all products from our store. Always remember to check the option “Only in W3 Life” in the search field. Do not mix ads with FULL sending of ads without FULL sending, as they leave different places and so there may be a charge for shipping.

https://eshops.mercadolivre.com.br/w3%20life

7 - Does the product accompany invoice?
A: All merchandise is accompanied by an invoice issued to the CPF / CNPJ informed in the purchase.

Any other questions are available!

name: Trixera Nutrition Soap Avène - 80g Venc.09 / 19 Promotion
description:
description
TriXera Nutrition is the new bar soap from the Avène hydration line.

The TriXera Nutrition bar soap promotes highly gentle and refreshing hygiene. Its creamy and delicately scented foam makes hygiene a real moment of pleasure. Enriched with Cold Cream, the TriXera Nutrition Barra formula is syndet, which respects the skin while cleaning and smoothing.

The Brand
The history of the Avène brand begins in 1736, in France. Legend has it that a horse with a serious skin disease was led to a water source, achieving healing. Thus, the calming and anti-inflammatory properties of Avène Thermal Water were discovered, and later scientifically proven. In 1990 the Pierre Fabre group developed products for the treatment of all skin types, even the most sensitive ones.

Indicated:
TriXera Nutrition is indicated for daily hygiene of dry and very dry sensitive skin and can be used both on the face and on the body. The pH is neutral. The soap provides good eye and gynecological tolerance.

How to use:
The TriXera Nutrition bar soap can be used morning and evening on damp skin, making foam. Rinse thoroughly and dry parts immediately after use.

name: Vegetable Soap With Activated Charcoal Suavetex
description:
Descrição
Orgânico natural sabonete vegetal natural suavetex com carvão ativado 80g

O sabonete vegetal natural suavetex com carvão ativado da orgânico natural limpa profundamente a pele, absorvendo as impurezas e promovendo uma limpeza suave e ao mesmo tempo eficaz. O carvão ativado tem intensa atividade detox e, por esse motivo, é excelente para limpeza de peles mistas, oleosas e acneicas (com cravos e espinhas). Além disso, ajuda no clareamento de manchas e tonifica a pele, deixando-A com uma aparência muito mais jovem e saudável. Útil para minimizar poros dilatados, suavizar a pele e restaurar sua elasticidade.

Características
• Produto natural e vegano
• Sem fragrância
• Possui massa-Base 100% vegetal
• Ação detox cutânea
• Não resseca a pele

Indicação
O sabonete natural com carvão ativado da orgânico natural é indicado para todos os tipos de pele, em especial peles mistas, oleosas e acneicas.

Ingredientes
Contém ativos naturais:
Extrato orgânico de camomila: emoliente, calmante e suavizante.

Composição: massa base vegetal (sodium palmate, sodium palm kernelate, sodium stearate, sodium chloride, gliceryn, sodium hydroxide, etidronic acid, aqua), parfum, charcoal powder, camomilla recutita(matricaria), flower extract.

Fórmula livre de: álcool, sulfatos, parabenos, triclosan, conservantes químicos, corantes artificiais e produtos de origem animal. Não é testado em animais.

Modo de usar
Aplique o sabonete natural com carvão ativado da orgânico natural sobre a pele molhada fazendo movimentos circulares. Enxágue em seguida. Pode ser utilizado diariamente.

Precaução
Havendo irritação suspenda o uso, não usar sob a pele ferida. Manter fora do alcance de crianças. Conservar em local fresco. Uso externo. Não ingerir.

description:

descricaoml - Description

Weleda's Calendula Natural Vegetable Soap is made with calming extracts of chamomile, German iris, pansy, rice and malt and essential oils, which form a light and delicate fragrance. Its creamy foam nourishes, protects and deeply moisturizes the skin.

Characteristics
• 100% Natural and Vegan product certified by Natrue
• Has anti-inflammatory, regenerating and calming properties
• Gently cleans without drying the skin
• It has a light and delicate fragrance

Recommendation
Weleda's natural and vegan vegetable soap is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin such as babies and children.

Ingredients
Composition: Sodium Palmate, Sodium Cocoate, Water (Aqua), Sodium Olivate, Fragrance (Parfum) ¹, Glycerin, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract (Marigold Extract), Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract (Chamomile Extract), Iris Germanica Root Extract (German Iris Root Extract), Viola Tricolor Extract (Pansy Extract), Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract (Rice Extract), Malt Extract (Malt Extract), Sodium Chloride, Sodium Stearate, Limonene¹, Linalool¹ , Citronellol¹, Geraniol¹.

¹ produced from essential oils

Formula free of: sugar, artificial sweeteners, surfactants, preservatives, flavors and dyes, synthetic or raw materials derived from mineral oils. Product not tested on animals.

How to use
Apply Weleda's calendula natural vegetable soap to your body using your hands or a bath sponge. Rinse thoroughly. This soap does not produce a lot of foam.

Precaution
If irritation discontinues use, do not use under the injured skin. KEEP OUT OF THE REACH OF CHILDREN. Store in a cool place. External use. Do not ingest.

name: Dove White Soap With 24 Units 90g Special Price
description:
description
description

The Dove White Soap promotes a healthy cleansing of the skin helping to keep it free from bacteria and dryness.
Enriched with 1/4 moisturizing cream ensuring that the skin's nutrition stays up to date with everyday external aggressions. Provides soft and silky skin for much longer.
The Dove White Soap forms a soft foam that does not harm the skin's natural PH, leaving the skin protected and comfortable in addition to a prolonged soft perfume.

How to use: Apply the soap over a bath sponge, and rub enough until a creamy foam is formed. Spread this foam throughout the body evenly. Rinse and feel your skin soft and smooth.

About the brand: To help millions of women enjoy their own beauty style, the Dove brand offers a wide range of hygiene and beauty products that make a genuine difference in the condition and touch of skin and hair. Without abandoning his direct association with the idea of ​​hydration, Dove began to position himself, in a broader concept, as a complete brand for the beauty of women. With this focus, it relaunched its entire line of shampoos and conditioners and debuted new variants, which played a fundamental role in changing the consumer's perception, very linked to soaps. Thus, shampoos for daily hair treatment, deodorants with special features for armpit care and bath cream appeared in 2008, with natural oils for hydrating and cleaning the skin.

Characteristics

Dove Branco Soap has a light and soft formula enriched with ¼ of moisturizing cream. Pleasant aroma. Modern and practical packaging. Contains 24 Units.

Composition: Sodium Lauroil, Stearic Acid, Sodium Sebate, Lauric Acid, Water, Sodium Isetionate, Sodium Stearate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoate / Sodium Palm Almond, Fragrance, Sodium Chloride, Cinc Oxide, Dioxide, Cinc Oxide Titanium, Tetrasodium Edta, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Alpha-Isomethionone, Methylpropional Butylphenyl, Citronelol, Coumarin, Cinilic Hexyl Aldehyde, Dipentene, Linalol.

name: Soap 100% natural Red Clay and Rosehip 120g
description:
Descrição
Sabonete de argila vermelha e rosa mosqueta, de espuma cremosa e macia, limpa e hidrata profundamente a pele, combatendo o envelhecimento e deixando a macia e viçosa.

A argila vermelha é um potente ativo mineral rico em ferro e cobre, propriedades indispensáveis na respiração e renovação celular. Sendo extremamente suave, pode ser usada em peles sensíveis e maduras. Previne e reduz as linhas de expressão, por ser uma estimuladora do colágeno, aumenta a elasticidade da pele e neutraliza os efeitos dos radicais livres. Promove uma microabrasão, retirando da pele sujeiras e toxinas, deixando a pele macia e aveludada.

O óleo de rosa mosqueta é rico em ácidos graxos insaturados, como o ácido oléico, linoleico e linolênico, possui também vitamina A e C, e tem propriedades antioxidantes e anti-inflamatórias. Além disso, o Óleo de Rosa Mosqueta é capaz de reforçar a síntese de colágeno e elastina, o que fortalece e dá firmeza à pele, sendo também responsável por nutri-la profundamente.

Contém óleo de babaçu, um dos representantes mais importantes das palmeiras brasileiras, muito comum na floresta amazônica, tem manejo sustentável e apresenta propriedades anti-inflamatórias, antivirais e ajuda o sistema imunológico, não causa descamação da pele e possui alto poder de espumação e limpeza natural.

Também contém óleo de amêndoas doce, que possui alta concentração de vitamina E, B, A, com propriedades umectantes e emolientes, que ajudam na retenção de água da pele, promovendo hidratação e deixando a pele com um aspecto macio e suave e óleo de macadâmia que atua diretamente nas regiões mais ressecadas e sensibilizadas, promovendo reparação na barreira cutânea.

- Indicado para todos os tipos de peles, principalmente as sensíveis a maduras ou que requerem maior hidratação. Ideal para utilização no inverno.
- Produto 100% natural, vegano e biodegradável.
- Livre de parabenos, petroquímicos, sulfatos, corantes e fragrâncias artificiais.
- Embalagem Feita em papel Kraft ecológico e celofane 100% biodegradável.
- Modo de usar: Aplique na pele úmida, massageie suavemente e enxague.
- Pode ser usado no corpo e no rosto.
- Peso mínimo: 120g
- Marca: INSITTA

name: Sabonete 100%natural De Argila Vermelha E Rosa Mosqueta 120g
description:
description
Red and rosehip clay soap, creamy and soft foam, cleans and deeply moisturizes the skin, fighting aging and leaving it soft and lush.

Red clay is a potent mineral active rich in iron and copper, essential properties for respiration and cell renewal. Being extremely smooth, it can be used on sensitive and mature skin. Prevents and reduces expression lines, as it stimulates collagen, increases skin elasticity and neutralizes the effects of free radicals. Promotes microabrasion, removing dirt and toxins from the skin, leaving the skin soft and velvety.

Rosehip oil is rich in unsaturated fatty acids, such as oleic, linoleic and linolenic acid, it also has vitamin A and C, and has antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties. In addition, Rosehip Oil is able to reinforce the synthesis of collagen and elastin, which strengthens and gives firmness to the skin, and is also responsible for deeply nourishing it.

Contains babassu oil, one of the most important representatives of Brazilian palm trees, very common in the Amazon rainforest, has sustainable management and has anti-inflammatory, antiviral properties and helps the immune system, does not cause skin peeling and has high foaming and cleansing power Natural.

It also contains sweet almond oil, which has a high concentration of vitamin E, B, A, with moisturizing and emollient properties, which help retain water in the skin, promoting hydration and leaving the skin with a soft and smooth appearance and macadamia oil. which acts directly on the most dry and sensitized regions, promoting repair of the skin barrier.

- Suitable for all skin types, especially those sensitive to mature or that require greater hydration. Ideal for winter use.
- 100% natural, vegan and biodegradable product.
- Free of parabens, petrochemicals, sulfates, dyes and artificial fragrances.
- Packaging Made of ecological Kraft paper and 100% biodegradable cellophane.
- How to use: Apply to damp skin, massage gently and rinse.
- Can be used on the body and face.
- Minimum weight: 120g
- Brand: INSITTA

description:
description

descricaoml - The Natural White Clay Soap from Elemento Mineral is formulated with ultrafine white clay that does not leave the rough soap on a smooth and biodegradable vegetable base, with aroma of the essential oils of Lavender, Melaleuca, Ylang Ylang and Vetiver that contains anti-inflammatory properties , soothing, purifying leaving the skin with less visible pores and softer and silky and the powerful hydration of Murumuru Butter rich in fatty acids, especially the myriad and lauric which replenishes the lipids by deeply hydrating and nourishing the skin. The Natural White Clay Soap provides softness and balance on the skin and a feeling of relaxation and well-being.

Characteristics
• Natural and Vegan Product
• Promotes silkiness and improves skin texture
• Stimulates cell renewal
• Moisturizes and Nourishes the skin

Recommendation
The Natural White Clay Soap from Elemento Mineral is suitable for all skin types, and can be used on the body and face.

Ingredients
White Clay: tones the skin, eliminates blemishes, reduces the appearance of enlarged pores, eliminates acne and prevents premature aging.
Essential Melaleuca Oil: Excellent antiseptic, antifungal and antibacterial, it shows great results if applied to bruises, scratches, insect bites, acnes or mycoses
Patchouli Essential Oil: stimulating, tonic, fungicidal and regenerating action. It is a great skin tissue regenerator, with high moisturizing action and can be used in eczema, dermatitis, wrinkles, and cracked skin.
Essential Vetiver Oil: powerful whitening of dark spots on the skin (melasmas, chloasmas, hyperpigmentation, etc.). Antiseptic, healing and skin tonic, suitable for dry skin, aged skin and cracking. Reducer of wrinkles, keloids and fibrosis.

Composition: Sodium Palmate, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Kaolin (White Clay), Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Astrocaryum Murumuruate, Parfum (alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Coumarine, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamalmal . Contains essential oils of Lavender, Melaleuca, Ylang Ylang and Vetiver

## ProdutosVegano.jpg ## ## Sem_teste_em_animais.jpg ##

Formula free of: parabens, formaldehyde releasers, synthetic dyes and fragrances, synthetic preservatives, sulfates and animal products. It is not tested on animals.

How to use
Apply the Natural Mineral White Vegetable Soap from Elemento Mineral over wet skin using circular motions. Then rinse. Can be used daily.

Precautions
If irritation discontinues use, do not use under the injured skin. In case of accidental contact with eyes, rinse with plenty of water. KEEP OUT OF THE REACH OF CHILDREN. Store in a cool place. External use. Do not ingest.

name: Dove Smooth Soap Bar Soap 90g
description:
Descrição
Dove não é um simples sabonete em barra comum. É um sabonete de beleza feito com tecnologia Syndet que vai além da limpeza, nutrindo a pele conforme remove a sujeira do dia a dia. O Sabonete Dove Esfoliação Suave combina esfoliantes finos, agentes de limpeza suave e 1/4 de creme hidratante para remover suavemente as impurezas da sua pele e reter a sua hidratação natural. Pensando em como conseguir uma pele macia? Todas já ouvimos como a esfoliação é uma parte importante da rotina de cuidado da pele, mas isso não significa que precisa ser um processo agressivo; a esfoliação deve sempre ser suave, e é aí que entra o Sabonete Dove Esfoliação Suave. Você pode usá-lo nas mãos, corpo e rosto diariamente, deixando a sua pele mais macia e bem cuidada todos os dias. Para uma melhor experiência no banho, sugerimos o seguinte modo de uso: primeiro, molhe suas mãos e esfregue o Sabonete Dove Esfoliação Suave entre elas suavemente até formar uma espuma rica e cremosa. Em seguida passe a espuma uniformemente pelo seu corpo, massageando para fazer a esfoliação. Por último, enxague com água morna. O Sabonete Dove Esfoliação Suave é dermatologicamente recomendado.Você pode ser fã do Sabonete Dove Esfoliação Suave, mas com tantas opções, por que não experimentar todos? Afinal, temos um sabonete para cada momento.

name: Sabonete Dove Branco Com 06 Unidades 90g Preço Especial
description:
Descrição
Descrição

O Sabonete Dove Branco promove uma limpeza saudável da pele ajudando a manter livre de bactérias e do ressecamento.
Enriquecido com 1/4 de creme hidratante garantindo que a nutrição da pele fique em dia mesmo com agressões externas do dia a dia. Proporcionado pele macia e sedosa por muito mais tempo.
O Sabonete Dove Branco forma uma espuma suave que não agride o PH natural da pele, deixando a pele protegida e confortável além de um perfume suave prolongado.

Modo de usar: Aplique o Sabonete sobre uma esponja de banho,e esfregue o suficiente até a formação de uma espuma cremosa. Espalhe esta espuma pelo corpo de forma uniforme. Enxágue e sinta sua pele macia e suave.

Sobre a marca: Para ajudar milhões de mulheres a aproveitar seu próprio estilo de beleza, a marca Dove oferece uma ampla gama de produtos de higiene e beleza que fazem uma diferença genuína na condição e toque da pele e dos cabelos. Sem abandonar sua associação direta com a idéia de hidratação, Dove começou a se posicionar, num conceito mais amplo, como marca completa para a beleza da mulher. Com esse foco, relançou toda a sua linha de xampus e condicionadores e estreou novas variantes, que tiveram papel fundamental para a mudança de percepção da consumidora, muito vinculada aos sabonetes. Assim, surgiram os xampus para tratamento diário do cabelo, os desodorantes com funcionalidades especiais para o cuidado das axilas e o creme de banho, em 2008, com óleos naturais para hidratação e limpeza da pele.

Caracteristicas

O Sabonete Dove Branco possui fórmula leve e suave enriquecida com ¼ de creme hidratante. Aroma agradável. Embalagem moderna e prática. Contém 06 Unidades.

Composição: Lauroil Isetionato De Sodio, Ácido Esteárico, Sebato De Sodio, Ácido Láurico, Agua, Isetionato De Sodio, Estearato De Sodio, Cocamidopropil Betaína, Cocoato De Sodio/Almendra De Palma Sódica, Fragancia, Cloruro De Sodio, Óxido De Cinc, Dióxido De Titanio, Edta Tetrasódico, Etidronato De Tetrasodio, Alfa-Isometilionona, Butilfenil Metilpropional, Citronelol, Cumarina, Aldehído Hexil Cinámico, Dipenteno, Linalol.

(Nota fiscal no nome do comprador.)

name: Anti-acne Asepxia Exfoliating Anti-Blackhead Soap 80g
description:
description
Asepxia Anti-acne Facial and Body Scrub Exfoliating Anti-Blackhead Action

Gently exfoliates, stimulates skin renewal and combats and helps prevent blackheads and pimples. With the new Hidro-Force technology and enriched with jojoba microspheres. For mixed skin.

The new Asepxia exfoliating anti-acne soap unclogs pores, regulates skin oiliness and fights blackheads and pimples, removing dead cells with microspheres of natural origin that provide skin renewal.

We know that you are always changing, so we change with you! We have evolved the entire anti-acne line Asepxia with the new advanced Hidro-Force formula, the perfect balance between technology and nature. Its unique combination of salicylic, glycolic acids and ingredients of natural origin fights blackheads and pimples while balancing the oiliness of your skin, leaving it healthier and more beautiful every day.

Multi-benefit formula, enriched with microspheres of rice and jojoba and maximum concentration of salicylic acid, which:

- Exfoliates gently;
- Stimulates skin renewal;
- Reduces blackheads;
- Leaves skin smoother.

INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE CONTAINING IN THE PACKAGE: Apply the soap on the damp face massaging gently, without pressing the bar hard on the skin, injecting in areas with blackheads and pimples. Rinse immediately afterwards.

PRECAUTIONS: For external use. Do not apply on the eyelids and around the eyes. Avoid sun exposure during use (sunscreen is recommended). Do not insist on continuous use if any undesirable effect occurs. During the first week of use, apply small amounts every other day. A slight burning sensation, pinching or dryness of the skin may be observed in the first applications. Keep out of the reach of children. Don't eat. In case of accidental contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly. If irritation occurs, discontinue use and seek medical advice. Do not use on children.

name: Dove Soap Bar Original Dove 6 Un - 90g
description:
description
Kit with 6 uni Original Dove Bar Soap 90g Dove is not a simple bar soap. It is a beauty soap made with Syndet technology that goes beyond cleansing, nourishing the skin as it removes the dirt from everyday life. The secret to beautiful skin is daily hydration, and no ordinary soap moisturizes better than Dove. Dove Original Soap combines a gentle cleansing formula with 1/4 moisturizing cream, leaving your skin soft, well cared for and looking healthy. The Dove Original Soap does not remove the natural hydration of your skin like the common bar soaps: its composition with 1/4 moisturizing cream helps to replenish the skin's nutrients leaving it better nourished and hydrated. For a better bathing experience, we suggest the following method of use: first, wet your hands and pass the Dove Original Soap between them until it forms a foam. Then massage the foam over your body and, finally, rinse with warm water. Dove Original Soap will not leave your skin dry and rough like ordinary soaps, and you can use it daily on your face, hands and body. Dove Original Soap is dermatologically recommended. You may be a fan of Dove Original Soap, but with so many options, why not try them all? After all, we have a soap for every moment.

name: Lipikar Surgras La Roche-posay Body Liquid Soap 400ml
description:
Descrição
Sabonete Líquido Corpo Lipikar Surgras La Roche-Posay 400ml





LOJA OFICIAL LA ROCHE-POSAY

__________________________________________________



PRODUTO:



Sabonete Líquido Corporal La Roche-Posay Lipikar Surgras 400ml

__________________________________________________



DESCRIÇÃO:



O Sabonete Corporal Lipikar Surgras limpa, nutre e protege as peles secas, sensíveis ou sensibilizadas, devolvendo sua flexibilidade e suavidade natural. O Sabonete Corporal Lipikar Surgras limpa profundamente e não agride a pele. Repõe os lipídios, e forma uma barreira que impede a perda de água, devolvendo e mantendo a hidratação da pele. Não contém sabão, e dessa forma, não agride e nem resseca a pele. É indicado para todos os tipos de pele, especialmente as mais sensíveis.

__________________________________________________

BENEFÍCIOS:



• Limpa a pele com suavidade;

• Nutre e protege a pele, devolvendo sua suavidade e flexibilidade.Sua fórmula enriquecida com um concentrado de lipídios a 10% e Niacinamida ajuda a restaurar a barreira cutânea e repor os lipídios necessários à pele durante o banho.



ATIVOS:



• Manteiga de Karité: forma película protetora na pele.

• Óleo de semente de girassol: potencializa a hidratação.

• Niacinamida: ação antiinflamatória, acalma a pele.

• Glicerina: recupera a elasticidade.

__________________________________________________

MODO DE USAR:


Aplique uma pequena quantidade do sabonete corporal Lipikar Surgras na palma da mão e espalhar sobre a pele previamente umedecida. Massageie levemente e enxague.

__________________________________________________

How to use:

- Basic mixture - Add 1 tablespoon of the traditional UBON flavoring in half a liter of water.

- Environments - Spray the basic mixture on the spot or moisten a cleaning cloth with the mixture and pass it on ceramic, porcelain, tile or cement floors.

- Traditional saunas - Spray the basic mixture on the spot or place this mixture in a clay container, positioned in a sheltered corner of the sauna.

- Residential saunas - Introduce 10 to 15 drops of flavoring in the container for the sauna vaporizer.

Precautions: Keep in a cool place (below 40 ° C and, after use, keep the bottle tightly closed).

_______________________________________

Precautions: Keep in a cool place (below 40 ° C and, after use, keep the bottle tightly closed).

Founded in 1976, in the Provence region (France), the LOCCITANE Group came up with the LOccitane en Provence brand, as a result of the true relationship of Olivier Baussan, founder of the brand, with the Provencal nature. With values ​​that excel in respect for man and the environment, for authenticity and sensoriality. For 43 years the LOCCITANE Group has privileged ingredients of protected origin (A.O.P.) and each raw material is carefully selected from its special benefits and fragrances, with studies that prove the high effectiveness of its formulas.
Created by the LOCCITANE Group in 2013, LOccitane au Brésil was born with the aim of awakening the look at Brazilian beauty in its most diverse facets, bringing joy, plurality and spontaneity in high quality cosmetics. description:
description
Captivates Nature Natural Organic Soap Vegan Calendula 100g

The Natural Vegetable Calendula Soap from Cativa Natureza was carefully prepared with calendula extracts, which soothes, softens and heals the skin, chamomile and fruits added to a vegetable base with babassu oil. It acts gently on delicate and sensitive skin, cleaning without damaging the protective layer of the skin. This product has the highest technology and the purest ingredients of nature, which provide a soft fragrance from the natural extracts of blackberry, vanilla and raspberry. It does not dry out and still nourishes, protects and perfumes.

Characteristics
• IBD certified natural and vegan product
• Has regenerating, calming and emollient properties
• Gently cleanses the skin without drying out
• Prevents skin dryness

Indications
The Natural Vegetable Calendula Soap from Cativa Natureza is indicated for daily use on all skin types, especially the most sensitive of babies, children and the elderly.

Ingredients
Contains natural assets:
Calendula: accelerates healing, fights infection, soothes, softens, regenerates, protects and moisturizes.
Chamomile: soothing, anti-inflammatory and invigorating.
Aloe Vera: soothing and regenerating.

Composition: Orbignya oleifera Seed Oil (Babassu Oil), Stearic Acid, Alcohol *, Sucrose *, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Calendula officinalis Extract * (Marigold Extract), Aloe barbadensis Extract (Aloe Vera Extract), Matricaria chamomilla Extract * (Chamomile Extract), Melaleuca alternifolia Leaf Water * (Tea Tree Hydrolate), Glycerin (and) Alcohol (and) Vaccinium angustifolium Fruit Extract (Blueberry Extract), Pyrus malus Fruit Extract (and ) Rubus idaeus Fruit Extract (and) Prunus armeniaca Fruit Extract (Apricot / Apricot Extract) (and) Rubus fruticosus Fruit Extract (Blackberry Extract) (and) Vitis vinifera Fruit Extract (Grape Extract), Vanilla planifolia Fruit Extract (Vanilla / Vanila Extract), titanium dioxide.
Contains 56.6% of tracked organic inputs.

Green: * IBD Certified Organic Products
Black: Certified Natural Products

Formula free of: parabens, formaldehyde releasers, synthetic dyes and fragrances, synthetic preservatives, sulfates and animal products. It is not tested on animals.

How to use
Apply the natural calendula vegetable soap from Cativa Natureza to the wet skin in a circular motion. Then rinse. Can be used daily.

Precautions
If irritation discontinues use, do not use under the injured skin. In case of accidental contact with eyes, rinse with plenty of water. KEEP OUT OF THE REACH OF CHILDREN. Store in a cool place. External use. Do not ingest.

name: Scented Soap Coffee Green Loccitane
description:
description
Nature transformed into energy. In the vast fields of Café Verde, the day begins in Brazil. The sun makes the country dawn, but it is the coffee that brings the energy for it to move. A true recharge of vitality, movement and encouragement to go further, always in search of new challenges. Its history is full of wealth and its tradition is made of Brazilianness. Coffee, which is at the beginning of every day. Green, which is still standing, in connection with nature. When transformed into oil, Green Coffee promotes energy that contributes to improving the quality and metabolism of the skin.
L'Occitane au Brésil found in the energy of Café Verde the inspiration for this masculine line of products for the body, face and hair, with benefits developed especially for the Brazilian man.

How to use: Massage gently under water, apply on wet skin and rinse.

How to buy LOccitane products?
It's simple! First select the desired items and quantities and click the Buy button to add them to the Shopping Cart. Then log into your account, select the delivery address and make the payment. Then just wait for your products to arrive at the requested address within the time period indicated at the end of the order. Did the products arrive? How about evaluating your experience and items? Your feedback is super important for other consumers and for us too! ;)

The LOCCITANE Group in Brazil.
Founded in 1976, in the Provence region (France), the LOCCITANE Group came up with the LOccitane en Provence brand, as a result of the true relationship of Olivier Baussan, founder of the brand, with the Provencal nature. With values ​​that excel in respect for man and the environment, for authenticity and sensoriality. For 43 years the LOCCITANE Group has privileged ingredients of protected origin (A.O.P.) and each raw material is carefully selected from its special benefits and fragrances, with studies that prove the high effectiveness of its formulas.
Created by the LOCCITANE Group in 2013, LOccitane au Brésil was born with the aim of awakening the look at Brazilian beauty in its most diverse facets, bringing joy, plurality and spontaneity in high quality cosmetics. Each product of the brand is made up of true and passionate stories, with exclusive design by artists who praise Brazilianness and reflecting the natural and cultural riches of Brazil.

name: Vegetable Soap Cream Malai Sri Sri Tattva 100g
description:
description
The Malai Sri Sri Tattva Body Cream Soap presents extra hydration for the whole body. Malai - is a type of curdled cream used in South Asia. It is done by heating unmixed whole milk to about 80 ° C for about an hour and then letting it cool. A thick yellowish layer of clotted and fatty proteins forms on the surface, which is removed. The process is usually repeated to remove most of the fat.

With its composition without sulfates (SLS - Free), it foams naturally and produces a deep cleansing for the whole body.

Offers a cleansing experience, deep relaxation and hydration.

Formula Ingredients: Milk Lipids, Disodium Edta, Glycerin, Parfum, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Titanium Dioxide

Usage Tip
Apply on damp face and neck, making delicate circular movements for approximately 1 minute. Rinse thoroughly avoiding contact with eyes. For best results we recommend regular use at least twice a week.

Content: 100g.

This Kit consists of 10 units, 5 shampoos and 5 soaps, weighing 120g each. The measure of soaps and shampoos varies from 6 to 7 cm in length, 5 cm in width and 3 cm in height. The packaging is made with Kraft paper and baking paper,

In this kit, in addition to nutritious soaps, there are moisturizers, exfoliants; anti acnes, antioxidants and detoxifiers.
Shampoos have anti residues, anti falls, anti dandruff, detoxifying and moisturizers.

The natural and handmade Vegan soaps and shampoos from Flowers, Fruits, Herbs, and from Castile; they are made manually, artisanal and without ingredients of animal origin in the formulation. Away from health-damaging chemical components, our products are made with natural ingredients, and colors; apart from synthetic dyes, it comes from nature's additives such as beets, leaves, saffron, charcoal, açaí, colored clays and others.

In the Vegan composition of this kit, we use: Algae, Flowers, Fruits, Herbs (from the Atlantic Forest). In our base we put Ashes, Xylitol, Cetyl Alcohol, colored clays. We also use vegetable oils and butters from: Murumuru, Palma, Palmiste, Babaçu, Turmeric, Olive Oil, Cupuaçu, Karité, Bacurí, Ucuubá, Babaçu and Cacau. The base of our soaps is all organic with natural dyes and soaps to foam in a natural way.
The entire Vegan line hydrates, nourishes, rejuvenates and softens the skin.
Castile Vegans moisturize, nourish, tone and detoxify.

This kit is suitable for normal skin and hair

Most of our soaps and shampoos are made by the Cold Process: Process of cold saponification. As they are not subjected to high temperatures, the properties of flowers, herbs, fruits and algae are preserved. The result is undoubtedly cleanliness, beauty, nutrition, hydration, natural health and without aggression. Cold Process is an ancient technique and loaded with beautiful stories and wisdom from our ancestors. It has soaps that take up to 26 days to be ready.
Take the aroma of the countryside to your home, discover some riches of the Vale do Ribeira and love your skin and hair more and more.
Our soap shop is located in the forest, in the middle of the second lung of Brazil.
Totally inspired by the Atlantic Forest and always thought of you.
Tie naturally and be extremely happy!

O sabonete vegetal Natural Suavetex com extrato orgânico de cúrcuma é livre de corantes e conservantes e garante uma pele mais saudável, macia e sedosa.

A cúrcuma é uma das substâncias da natureza mais benéficas para a saúde humana. Seus benefícios para a pele são diversos, entre eles, destaque para o seu alto poder de revitalização. Auxilia no combate as estrias, rugas, marcas de expressão e sinais de envelhecimento. Graças ao seu poder regenerativo, também é indicado para hidratar áreas mais suscetíveis ao ressecamento, como cotovelos, calcanhares e joelhos. Renova as células da pele e ajuda no tratamento da acne, devido às suas propriedades antissépticas e antibacterianas. Contribui para limpar cicatrizes de acne e outras inflamações.

Massa Base Vegetal (Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Etidronic Acid, Aqua), Parfum. Ingrediente Orgânico: Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Callus Extract (Extrato de Cúrcuma).

- Sem sulfatos;

The LOCCITANE Group in Brazil.
Founded in 1976, in the Provence region (France), the LOCCITANE Group came up with the LOccitane en Provence brand, as a result of the true relationship of Olivier Baussan, founder of the brand, with the Provencal nature. With values ​​that excel in respect for man and the environment, for authenticity and sensoriality. For 43 years the LOCCITANE Group has privileged ingredients of protected origin (A.O.P.) and each raw material is carefully selected from its special benefits and fragrances, with studies that prove the high effectiveness of its formulas.
Created by the LOCCITANE Group in 2013, LOccitane au Brésil was born with the aim of awakening the look at Brazilian beauty in its most diverse facets, bringing joy, plurality and spontaneity in high quality cosmetics. Each product of the brand is made up of true and passionate stories, with exclusive design by artists who praise Brazilianness and reflecting the natural and cultural riches of Brazil.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

1 - Is the merchandise available for immediate delivery?

2 - What is the shipping cost for my zip code?
A: You can automatically calculate on the right side of the screen, below the product price, by clicking on “Calculate delivery time”. There will appear the deadline and the amount of freight to the informed zip code.

3 - Why do you say it's free shipping and you're charging shipping?
A: Mercado Livre changed its free shipping policy, inserting several variables for the calculation of freight such as product weight and size, in addition to the distance between seller and buyer. Thus, purchases over R $ 99.00 will not always have free shipping. We remind you that shipping is calculated automatically by Mercado Livre and we have no control over its value.

In some cases the tracking may be invalid due to a technical error between the carrier and Mercado Livre, however you will be able to track the shipment by the purchase details.

description:
description
Description:
DeTony Fácil Concentrado is an ecological composition with excellent performance in removing
heavy dirt that is difficult to remove.
Provides security for professional work as it can be used on all types of fabrics and leather, without causing the risk of fading, staining, or tearing the fabrics, in addition to not foaming and rising to the engine of the extraction machine causing danger of damage .

Applications:
In Vehicles: Cleaning upholstery, fabric, leather, roof, door trim, carpet, wheels, wheel case, tires, glass, rubber, bodywork, engine wash.

Professionals: Sofa and upholstery washers using extractor or tornador
Use with extractor: Spray the diluted product, according to the degree of dirt directly on the surface to be cleaned, with the aid of a sprayer. Leave on for 5 minutes. Afterwards, brush with a circular motion. It can be manually or with brush polisher. Then remove the dirt using the extractor.

How to dry use smooth surfaces, plastics and others:
Apply the pure or diluted product by rubbing gently with the help of a sponge, hair broom, soft brush or cloth, then remove with a clean, dry cloth and then wipe with a damp cloth to neutralize the action of the product.

Give preference to the microfiber cloth as it does not loose fiber or paint.

Instant action

The soap has a poor effect on fungi. It acts more efficiently against bacteria. Therefore, sulfur does not fight ringworm.

The white cloth is a type of fungus, so the soap does not act directly on the treatment, but it helps. In addition to other products indicated by the dermatologist, the soap works by balancing changes in the bacterial flora of the skin.

name: Sabonete Barra Naturals Hidrata & Perfuma Palmolive 150g
description:
Descrição
Palmolive Naturals Leite e Pétalas de Rosas com ingredientes de origem 100% natural foi inspirado na natureza para realçar sua beleza.

Sua fórmula combina leite e extrato de pétalas de rosas, proporcionando um banho suavizante, deixando sua pele macia e delicamente perfumada.

O leite é um alimento completo, utilizado pelo homem há séculos e com reconhecida capacidade de hidratar e nutrir a pele e o cabelo. A rosa, da mesma maneira, já era cultivada no Oriente há mais de 5 mil anos e se tornou um símbolo do amor e da delicadeza.

Lindas, perfumadas e muito suaves ao toque, suas pétalas têm várias utilidades, até em receitas de doces e outros pratos, e também para tratar a pele, graças às suas propriedades hidratantes e regeneradoras.

Esses dois ingredientes estão reunidos na fórmula do sabonete Palmolive Naturals Hidrata e Perfuma com Leite e Pétalas de Rosas, cuja fórmula exclusiva se ativa com a água para ajudar sua pele a reter mais hidratação que os sabonetes comuns, deixando-a suave e naturalmente hidratada.

name: Kit 3 Bar Soap Actine Darrow Acneic Skin - 80g Each
description:
Descrição
Kit com 3 Sabonete Barra Actine Darrow Pele Acneica - 80g Cada

Ideal para a higiene diária das peles mais oleosas, o Actine Control Sabonete Barra limpa profundamente todos os dias! Ele controla a oleosidade por até 9 horas, proporcionando uma sensação calmante e hidratante. Sua fórmula hipoalergênica, não comedogênica e sem corantes auxilia na prevenção de acnes.

Modo de Uso:
Massageie suavemente o produto na pele umedecida até fazer espuma. Enxague abundantemente. Utilize de 1 a 2 vezes ao dia ou conforme a orientação do seu dermatologista.

A Darrow Dermocosméticos é uma marca brasileira de dermocosméticos que se preocupa em oferecer aos consumidores produtos comprovadamente eficazes, acessíveis e adaptados para as peles brasileiras. Presente há mais de 50 anos no mercado, possui a expertise reconhecida no segmento de higienização.
Actine da Darrow é uma linha amplamente recomendada por dermatologistas de todo o Brasil e realmente entrega excelentes resultados.

Indicação:
Para todas as pessoas com peles oleosas e acneicas.

O Actine Sabonete Barra é um produto para realizar uma limpeza profunda diária da pele oleosa e acneica, sem danificar ou deixar a pele da face ressecada ou repuxando. O controle eficaz da oleosidade é possível graças ao Pca de Zinco.
O Actine Sabonete Barra tem sua fórmula enriquecida com Aloe Vera e murumuru, que juntos conseguem hidratar a pele reduzindo o efeito de repuxamento. Além disso, o ativo murumuru consegue amenizar as vermelhidões da pele do rosto, ajudando a reduzir as pequenas lesões causadas pela acne.
Actine Sabonete Barra possui ainda em sua fórmula, uma exclusiva combinação de ácido salicílico com enxofre coloidal, que juntos conseguem agir profundamente na pele abrindo os poros e removendo até as impurezas mais profundas.
Actine Sabonete Barra te dá uma sensação única de frescor e limpeza.

Benefícios:

• Higieniza a pele.
• Desobstrui os poros.
• Controle Eficaz da Oleosidade.
• Ação hidratante, evitando o efeito de repuxamento.
• Não danifica e nem resseca a pele

name: Lemongrass Vegan Organic Natural Soap 100g
description:
Descrição
Cativa natureza sabonete natural orgânico vegano capim limão 100g

O sabonete vegetal natural de capim limão da cativa natureza é produzido artesanalmente a partir de óleos vegetais puros e o poderoso óleo essencial de capim limão, responsável por estimular a circulação linfática e melhorar a tonicidade da pele. Limpa suavemente o rosto e o corpo, deixando a pele suave, macia e purificada sem ressecá-La.

Características
• Produto 100% natural, orgânico e vegano certificado pelo ibd
• Contém propriedades regeneradoras, calmantes e desintoxicantes
• Limpa suavemente rosto e corpo sem ressecar
• Possui textura cremosa

Indicações
O sabonete vegetal natural de capim limão da cativa natureza é indicado para todos os tipos de pele e pode ser usado no rosto e no corpo.

Ingredientes
Contém ativos naturais:

Óleo de babaçu: hidratante, rico em ácidos graxos excelentes para a saúde da pele.
Óleo essencial de capim limão: antisséptico, analgésico, estimula a circulação linfática e melhora a tonicidade da pele.

Composição: orbignya oleifera seed oil (óleo de babaçu), stearic acid, sodium hydroxide, alcohol, sucrose, citric acid, titanium dioxide, cymbopogon citratus leaf oil (óleo essencial de capim limão), geraniol.

Verde: Produtos orgânicos certificados pelo ibd
Preto: produtos naturais certificados

Fórmula livre de: parabenos, liberadores de formol, corantes e fragrâncias sintéticas, conservantes sintéticos, sulfatos e produtos de origem animal. Não é testado em animais.

Modo de usar
Aplique o sabonete vegetal orgânico de capim limão da cativa natureza sobre a pele molhada fazendo movimentos circulares. Enxágue em seguida. Pode ser utilizado diariamente.

Precauções
Havendo irritação suspenda o uso, não usar sob a pele ferida. Em caso de contato acidental com os olhos, lavar com água abundantemente. Manter fora do alcance de crianças. Conservar em local fresco. Uso externo. Não ingerir.

name: Argiloterapia Vegetable Soap Yellow Clay Vegan 100g
description:
description
* 100% secure purchase through GUARANTEED PURCHASE

Natural yellow clay soap
100G
Aroma art
No parabens or preservatives
Cleans the skin deeply, improving elasticity
Ideal for all skin types

PRODUCT ACTIONS

> The Yellow Clay Soap from Arte dos Aromas is a vegan and natural product.
> Has remineralizing and antioxidant action
> Cleans the skin deeply, improving elasticity
> Clay has a lightening action in addition to cleaning the skin because it is rich in functional trace elements
> Contains organic ingredients and essential oils.
> Clay therapy brings the renewing energy of the land and nature to take care of its beauty.


HOW TO USE

Apply on the body / face. Rinse off.


COMPOSITION

Composition: Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Acqua / Water, sodium hydroxide, Argilla, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Citrus medica limonum (Lemon) oil, Citral , Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool.

> WITH ESSENTIAL OIL OF LAVENDER, LEMON AND ORANGE

Valid until 05/13/2022

CLAYS AND THEIR BENEFITS

Clay is one of the three oldest and most powerful medicines of mankind, along with water and plants.


CLAY COMPOSITION

> The clay contains silica, aluminum, iron, titanium, calcium, sodium, potassium, manganese and sometimes even magnesium.
> The proportions of these compounds vary according to their origin, but all have a high percentage of silica and aluminum, which explains their healing and anti-inflammatory properties.

> The minerals found in clays work as potentiated depending on their concentration.
> When these minerals are in very small doses, they are called trace elements, but their remineralizing effect is noticeable even in these quantities.
> Its negative ions have the ability to attract and absorb toxins from positive ions, reducing toxicity levels and producing antiseptic, antibiotic and healing effects.


CLAY IN AESTHETICS

> In aesthetics, clay skin treatments are extraordinarily effective, an excellent example being the beneficial effect they have on cleaning and lightening the skin and as a complement to stretch mark reduction treatments.

> After a clay treatment, the skin should be washed with running water without any cosmetic products, always toning to close the pores and moisturize with a facial cream.

> It is common, in the first treatments, to find disturbing results, such as increased skin irritation: this is normal, as it is the detoxification process through the skin - the treatment should not be suspended, as the cure will follow.

ABOUT THE MANUFACTURER

The Art of aromas has nature as its source of inspiration, believes in natural beauty as a force for good. Each product is made with organic ingredients, plant extracts and natural essential oils and this reflects our commitment to develop cosmetics free of chemical ingredients. such as parabens, dyes, sulfates, silicones, mineral oil. They understand that by making good choices, we generate significant changes in our lives and health.

ABOUT THE SELLER

Natus Beauty aims to give people the possibility of taking care of their bodies using what nature offers us, providing quality of life, health and beauty in a sustainable way. We believe that happiness is in the balance of things and in the essence of each being.

Buying Tips

Attendance

name: Natural Organic Vegetable Soap With Activated Charcoal 80g
description:
description
Natural organic natural vegetable soap suaveetex with activated carbon 80g

The mildetex natural vegetable soap with activated charcoal from natural organic deeply cleanses the skin, absorbing impurities and promoting a gentle yet effective cleansing. Activated charcoal has an intense detox activity and, for this reason, it is excellent for cleaning mixed, oily and acne-prone skin (with blackheads and pimples). In addition, it helps in the bleaching of spots and tones the skin, leaving it with a much younger and healthier appearance. Useful to minimize enlarged pores, soften the skin and restore its elasticity.

Characteristics
• Natural and vegan product
• Without fragrance
• Has 100% vegetable-based pasta
• Cutaneous detox action
• Does not dry out the skin

Recommendation
The natural soap with activated charcoal from natural organic is suitable for all skin types, especially mixed, oily and acne-prone skin.

Ingredients
Contains natural assets:
Organic chamomile extract: emollient, soothing and soothing.

Composition: vegetable based pasta (sodium palmate, sodium palm kernelate, sodium stearate, sodium chloride, gliceryn, sodium hydroxide, etidronic acid, aqua), parfum, charcoal powder, chamomilla recutita (matricaria), flower extract.

Formula free of: alcohol, sulfates, parabens, triclosan, chemical preservatives, artificial colors and products of animal origin. It is not tested on animals.

How to use
Apply natural soap with activated charcoal from natural organic on wet skin in a circular motion. Then rinse. Can be used daily.

Precaution
If irritation discontinues use, do not use under the injured skin. Keep out of the reach of children. Store in a cool place. External use. Do not ingest.

name: Natural Organic Vegetable Soap With Activated Charcoal 80g
description:
description
Natural organic natural vegetable soap suaveetex with activated carbon 80g

The mildetex natural vegetable soap with activated charcoal from natural organic deeply cleanses the skin, absorbing impurities and promoting a gentle yet effective cleansing. Activated charcoal has an intense detox activity and, for this reason, it is excellent for cleaning mixed, oily and acne-prone skin (with blackheads and pimples). In addition, it helps in the bleaching of spots and tones the skin, leaving it with a much younger and healthier appearance. Useful to minimize enlarged pores, soften the skin and restore its elasticity.

Characteristics
• Natural and vegan product
• Without fragrance
• Has 100% vegetable-based pasta
• Cutaneous detox action
• Does not dry out the skin

Recommendation
The natural soap with activated charcoal from natural organic is suitable for all skin types, especially mixed, oily and acne-prone skin.

Ingredients
Contains natural assets:
Organic chamomile extract: emollient, soothing and soothing.

Composition: vegetable based pasta (sodium palmate, sodium palm kernelate, sodium stearate, sodium chloride, gliceryn, sodium hydroxide, etidronic acid, aqua), parfum, charcoal powder, chamomilla recutita (matricaria), flower extract.

Formula free of: alcohol, sulfates, parabens, triclosan, chemical preservatives, artificial colors and products of animal origin. It is not tested on animals.

How to use
Apply natural soap with activated charcoal from natural organic on wet skin in a circular motion. Then rinse. Can be used daily.

Precaution
If irritation discontinues use, do not use under the injured skin. Keep out of the reach of children. Store in a cool place. External use. Do not ingest.

name: Vegetable Glycerin Soap Base - 960g - Vegan
description:
description
Vegetable glycerin neutral base
for making soaps
960g bar
just melt in a water bath and shape
Composition: Stearic Acid, Olaeis Palm Sodium Kernelate, Water, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrassodium Edta, Etidronic Acid, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Propylene Glycol, Sucrose, Alcohol, Volatile content: 35%
Preparation Instructions:
1) Cut the base into small pieces. Place the base in an agate or stainless steel pan in a warm water bath for melting, stirring until completely melted.
2) For each kilogram of base add (1% to 2%) of essence.
3) To achieve perfection in the upper part of the soap, quickly remove the formed film by spraying alcohol and passing a paper towel or spatula on top.
4) Drying depends on the location and ambient temperature.
5) For the best conservation, after the total drying, wrap the soap in a plastic film.

- 15 Mini Cinnamon Pink Soaps of 15g each unit

------------------------------------------------

Product Descriptions:

High Concentration Eucalyptus Essence

- Flavoring with natural essential oil for SAUNA, DOMESTIC AND COMMERCIAL ENVIRONMENTS. It has a striking and refreshing aroma, providing a sense of well-being.

How to use:

- Basic mixture - Add 1 tablespoon of the traditional UBON flavoring in half a liter of water.

- Environments - Spray the basic mixture on the spot or moisten a cleaning cloth with the mixture and pass it on ceramic, porcelain, tile or cement floors.

- Traditional saunas - Spray the basic mixture on the spot or place this mixture in a clay container, positioned in a sheltered corner of the sauna.

- Residential saunas - Introduce 10 to 15 drops of flavoring in the container for the sauna vaporizer.

Precautions: Keep in a cool place (below 40 ° C and, after use, keep the bottle tightly closed).

NOTE: Combustible liquid, keep away from flame.

- Do not ingest
- Do not use on the skin
- Keep away from children.

------------------------------------------------

Eucalyptus Ubon Soap

- The Ubon Tradição Eucalyptus soap receives eucalyptus essential oil, emollients and humectants that leave your skin soft, maintaining its natural hydration.

- It has a striking and refreshing aroma, providing a feeling of well-being and relaxation, during and after the bath.

- Dermatologically tested.

--------------------------------------------------

Soap Ubon Cinnamon Rose

- The Cinnamon Rose Ubon Tradição soap has emollients and humectants that maintain the skin's natural hydration, leaving it soft and toned.

- Its striking and pleasant aroma provides a feeling of well-being during and after bathing in addition to leaving the delicate scent of pink Cinnamon on your skin.

- Dermatologically tested.

name: Sabonete E Shampoo Vegano De Erva Doce 125g Cada.
description:
description
ANVISA: 3529906012060000016
INPI: 919152767
This kit consists of a Shampoo and a Fennel Soap. The weight of each product is 125g. The measure varies from 6 to 7 cm in length, 5 cm in width and 3 cm in height.

They are made by hand, without artificial colors, without sulfates, parabens and without petroleum derivatives.
They are 100% natural, where even the colors come from nature's additives such as: leaves and clays.

This Fennel Shampoo with green and black clay, moisturizes, nourishes and stimulates shine and softness to the hair.
Green clay is great for scalp care. It is a component of mineral origin, 100% natural, collected directly from the soil. It is regenerative, favors integral cell reproduction, remineralizing and exfoliating the scalp. Black gives sustainability to the threads.
As they are made by Cold Process and are not subjected to high temperatures, the properties of Fennel and oils are all preserved. The result is undoubtedly: cleanliness, vitality, nutrition, hydration, natural health and without aggression.
How to use: Apply to the head, as if it were applying to the skin. The process of adapting the threads will depend on the time and how many times you use the product, after all, the hair needs to be detoxified. For this reason, it will naturally mist your hair for a long time, as the result will be shine, balance, freedom and naturalness of the strands.

Fennel soap removes impurities from the skin. Its continuous use nourishes and provides rejuvenation, with reduction of wrinkles.

In this Vegan composition we use: Herbs (from the Atlantic Forest), palm oil, Ucubá, Cupuaçu, Xylitol Cetyl Alcohol, Olive Oil, Grape seed oil, Green and Black Clay, Bacurí, Gray, Cupuaçu, Karite and Saponária.

Take the aroma of the countryside to your home, discover some riches of the Vale do Ribeira and love your skin and hair more and more.

Our soap shop is located in the forest, in the middle of the second lung of Brazil.
Totally inspired by the Atlantic Forest and always thought of you.

Tie naturally and be extremely happy.
 Any purchase made on Friday, after business hours, will be posted on Monday. The postal service of Miracatu, does not work on Saturdays.

The LOCCITANE Group in Brazil.
Founded in 1976, in the Provence region (France), the LOCCITANE Group came up with the LOccitane en Provence brand, as a result of the true relationship of Olivier Baussan, founder of the brand, with the Provencal nature. With values ​​that excel in respect for man and the environment, for authenticity and sensoriality. For 43 years the LOCCITANE Group has privileged ingredients of protected origin (A.O.P.) and each raw material is carefully selected from its special benefits and fragrances, with studies that prove the high effectiveness of its formulas.
Created by the LOCCITANE Group in 2013, LOccitane au Brésil was born with the aim of awakening the look at Brazilian beauty in its most diverse facets, bringing joy, plurality and spontaneity in high quality cosmetics. name: Organic Vegetable Soap Castanha Do Pará 100g Reserva Folio
description:
Descrição
Características do Produto – Orgânico
Tipos de Pele – Pele Seca ou Ressecada
descricaoml – Descrição
O Sabonete Vegetal Orgânico Castanha do Pará da Reserva Folio é 100% vegetal. Produzido artesanalmente com o valioso óleo de castanha do Pará, que possui propriedades emolientes e nutritivas sendo rico em vitaminas A e E, além de diversos minerais como o selênio. Este sabonete auxilia a prevenir envelhecimento precoce e ainda revigora a pele tornando-a mais macia e saudável.

Características
• Produto 100% Natural, Orgânico e Vegano certificado pelo IBD
• Possui propriedades nutritivas, hidratantes e emolientes
• Possui pH equilibrado
• Ajuda a manter a vitalidade natural da pele

Indicações
O Sabonete Vegetal Orgânico Castanha do Pará da Reserva Folio é indicado para peles ressecadas.

Ingredientes
Composição: Sodium Babassuate*, Sodium Palmitate*, Sodium Soyate*, Alcohol, Sucrose, Brazil Nut Oil (Óleo de Castanha do Pará / Castanha do Brasil).

Com 82% de insumos orgânicos rastreados.
Verde: *Produtos Orgânicos Certificados pelo IBD
Preto: Produtos Naturais Certificados

Fórmula livre de: parabenos, corantes sintéticos, fragrâncias artificiais, ingredientes derivados de petróleo e ingredientes de origem animal. Não é testado em animais.

Modo de usar
Aplique o sabonete vegetal orgânico castanha do Pará da Reserva Folio sobre a pele molhada fazendo movimentos circulares. Enxágue em seguida. Pode ser utilizado diariamente.

Precauções
Havendo irritação suspenda o uso, não usar sob a pele ferida. Em caso de contato acidental com os olhos, lavar com água abundantemente. MANTER FORA DO ALCANCE DE CRIANÇAS. Conservar em local fresco. Uso externo. Não ingerir.

#useorganico

description:
description
Product Features - Organic
Skin Types - Dry or Dry Skin
descricaoml - Description
The Organic Vegetable Soap Castanha do Pará from Reserva Folio is 100% vegetable. Produced by hand with the valuable oil of Brazil nuts, which has emollient and nourishing properties and is rich in vitamins A and E, as well as several minerals such as selenium. This soap helps prevent premature aging and also invigorates the skin making it softer and healthier.

Characteristics
• 100% Natural, Organic and Vegan product certified by IBD
• Has nourishing, moisturizing and emollient properties
• Has a balanced pH
• Helps maintain the skin's natural vitality

Indications
The Organic Vegetable Soap Castanha do Pará from Reserva Folio is indicated for dry skin.

Ingredients
Composition: Sodium Babassuate *, Sodium Palmitate *, Sodium Soyate *, Alcohol, Sucrose, Brazil Nut Oil (Brazil Nut Oil / Brazil Nut Oil).

With 82% of tracked organic inputs.
Green: * IBD Certified Organic Products
Black: Certified Natural Products

Formula free of: parabens, synthetic dyes, artificial fragrances, ingredients derived from petroleum and ingredients of animal origin. It is not tested on animals.

How to use
Apply the brown organic vegetable soap of Pará from Reserva Folio over the wet skin using circular motions. Then rinse. Can be used daily.

Precautions
If irritation discontinues use, do not use under the injured skin. In case of accidental contact with eyes, rinse with plenty of water. KEEP OUT OF THE REACH OF CHILDREN. Store in a cool place. External use. Do not ingest.

#useorganic

name: L'occitane Au Brésil Scented Lemon Soap
description:
description
Lemongrass Scented Soap is creamy and gently cleanses your hands and body, leaving your skin scented with a green citrus fragrance.

Lemon GrassA breath of freshness. The evening breeze brings the green fragrance of the Capim-Limão bushes. Its balance spreads a fresh, spicy fragrance in the air filled with citrus notes, providing a sense of vigor that renews the senses. As a family story that is told from generation by generation, the benefits of this plant for the well-being of body and mind are passed on as a generous recipe from the land to man. In each region it is baptized with a different name, living proof of a Brazil full of diversity. name: Kit 1 Sabonete E 2 Óleos Carolight - Frete Gratis
description:
description
DO YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE BUYING?

IS BUYING AN OIL THAT HAS 2% HYDROQUINONE

DO YOU KNOW WHAT HYDROQUINONE IS?
_______________________________________________________________________

** Hydroquinone, what is it indicated for and what is it for?

Hydroquinone cream and gel are indicated for the gradual lightening of spots such as melasmas or chloasmas, freckles, solar melanosis and in other conditions in which skin hyperpigmentation occurs due to excessive melanin production.

** What are Hydroquinone's contraindications?

Hydroquinone cream and gel are contraindicated for people hypersensitive to hydroquinone or any of the components of the formula.

Hydroquinone cream and gel should not be used on large areas of the body.

Hydroquinone cream and gel should not come into contact with the eyes. In case of accidental contact, the patient should wash his eyes with plenty of water and contact his doctor immediately. If the product comes in contact with the lips, an anesthetic effect and bitter sensation may occur.

Hydroquinone cream and gel should not be used on irritated skin and in the presence of sunburn.

Hydroquinone cream and gel should not be used as a sunscreen.

Hydroquinone cream and gel should not be used to whiten eyelashes and eyelashes.

** This medicine is contraindicated for children under 12 years.

This medication should not be used by pregnant women without medical advice or from the dentist.

_______________________________________________________________________

NOW ABOUT THE PRODUCT:

Carolight Clarifying Oil is an imported product that will lighten and remove your skin spots in a few days, leaving it free from hyperpigmentation, dark spots, acne spots and other imperfections ... WE RECOMMEND THAT YOU USE THE COMPLETE KIT FOR BEST RESULTS!


We are shipping normally and your product arrives quickly!

Carolight Soap and Oil are especially useful for those who want to feel a different sensation on the skin, remove their spots and lighten the dark parts of your face or body region.

We ship the product right after your purchase and any questions are available.

BE CAREFUL WITH VARIOUS FAKE PRODUCTS THERE
FAKE products do not work.

Thank you !
