name: Sabonete Natural De Rosas E Sal Do Himalaia 90g Unevie
description:
description
Natural Soap Roses, Himalayan Salt, Rosehip Oil 90G Unevie4

Natural rose soap, himalayan salt and rosehip oil that cleans without damaging or drying the skin.
It has a rejuvenating, moisturizing and preventive action against premature skin aging.
Suitable for all skin types, including mature, dry and sensitive.

How to use me

Use the bar directly on the moistened skin (or apply with the loofah on the body), massage and rinse.
It can be used on the face too.

My qualities

Handmade and vegan product.
Product not tested on animals.
Rosehip essential oil has anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties. Rich in vitamin C, it contributes to skin whitening. Moisturizes and brightens the skin, besides helping to control acne.
Himalayan salt has a detoxifying, revitalizing and rejuvenating action.
Because it contains vegetable oils and butters in its formulation, it promotes hydration and deep nutrition to the skin.
Sulfate free
Laurel free
Paraben free

What I contain

Fragrance of roses, rosehip vegetable oils, palm, palm kernel, olive oil, castor oil, candelilla wax, white clay, himalayan salt, rosemary resin, demineralized water, sodium hydroxide, rosemary resin and vitamin E, bleach.

A little more about me

Weight: 90g
Packaging: 100% compostable cotton fabric and biodegradable and compostable cellophane.
Tag: recycled and biodegradable paper.
Natural products can vary in color due to the harvest and / or characteristics of the ingredients of the composition.

About the brand:

Unevie
Brand created and managed by women, strongly inspired by the ancient art of handmade soap.
Its purpose is to deliver natural, handcrafted products, free of animal raw material and capable of replacing the options offered by the industry.
They do not carry out animal tests.

-> It is a good ally against dermatological diseases.

name: Kit With 12 Green Clay Soaps - 100% Glycerin
description:
description
The Green Clay Soap, is a soap for body and face. Its gentle formula allows to clean without drying out, in addition to perfuming with a delicate fragrance. Composed of ultrafine clay, which is well absorbed by our body, thus allowing all the benefits of the clay to be achieved, in addition to not leaving the soap rough. It also has emollient and moisturizing action, regenerating the skin.

Green clay is a very good tensor by nature, it performs a natural “peeling”, thus removing excess oil from our dermis. The use of clay for aesthetic treatments is quite indicated and known, as it is rich in mineral salts such as: zinc, aluminum, potassium, silicon, calcium, iron, among others.

The green clay soap also has a natural exfoliating action, as the clay removes dead cells and helps eliminate skin stains, favoring rapid healing and restoration of the injured tissue.

How to use: Gently massage wet skin, passing the product through the body / face. Then rinse.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

1 - Is the merchandise available for immediate delivery?

Therefore, it is common to be used in cosmetics and hygiene products, such as creams, shampoos and toothpaste.

Composition: Orbignya Oleifera seed oil, sodium hydroxide, Sodium, Carbonete, Sucrose, Zizuphus, Joazeiro, Bark, Extract.

Among the benefits of juá soap are:

Softens, moisturizes, exfoliates and cleanses the skin
Combats spots, wrinkles, acne, itching and other dermatitis
Healing and natural repellent
Indicated for feminine intimate hygiene

name: Kit With 3 Soaps 110g Of Calendula - Cheiro D'ervas
description:
Descrição
POR QUE COMPRAR NA W3 LIFE?

ENVIO IMEDIATO!
Compras realizadas e com pagamento liberado até as 13:00 são enviadas no mesmo dia, após as 13:00 são enviadas na manhã do próximo dia útil.

MERCADO LÍDER PLATINUM!
Só trabalhamos com estoque à pronta entrega e prestamos o melhor serviço pós-vendas.

REVENDEDOR AUTORIZADO!
Fornecemos somente produtos originais comprados diretamente do fabricante.

EMITIMOS NOTA FISCAL EM TODAS AS VENDAS!
Não adianta querer um país melhor e sonegar imposto, muito menos comprar de quem sonega. Nós enviamos nota fiscal em todas as vendas!

AINDA EM DÚVIDA?
Confira a opinião de quem já comprou conosco! Basta clicar em “Ver mais dados deste vendedor”, abaixo da barra verde de reputação.

______________________________________________________________

O Sabonete de Calêndula é feito com flores de calêndula que ajudam a diminuir a oleosidade da pele e aumentar a sua tonicidade. A calêndula é popularmente conhecida como mal-me-quer e se parece muito com a margarida. Essa planta é reconhecida por suas propriedades antissépticas e cicatrizantes, por ativar a circulação e por ser adstringente e regeneradora da pele. Além disso, ela auxilia no controle de infecções e escoriações.

Composição: Aqua, orbignya, oleifera seed oil, sodium hydroxide, sodium carbonate, sucrose, schinus terebinthifolius leaf extract, calendula flower extract parfum
_____________________________________________________________

DÚVIDAS FREQUENTES

1 - A mercadoria está disponível à pronta entrega?
R: Todas as mercadorias são para pronta entrega.

2 – Qual o valor do frete para o meu CEP?
R: Você pode calcular automaticamente no lado direito da tela, abaixo do preção do produto, ao clicar em “Calcular prazo de entrega”. Ali aparecerá o prazo e o valor do frete para o CEP informado.

3 – Por que diz que é frete grátis e está cobrando o frete?
R: O Mercado Livre alterou a sua política de frete grátis, inserindo diversas variáveis para o cálculo do frete como peso e tamanho do produto, além da distância entre vendedor e comprador. . Com isso, nem sempre as compras acima de R$99,00 terão frete grátis. Lembramos que o frete é calculado automaticamente pelo Mercado Livre e não temos qualquer controle sobre o seu valor.

4 - Como são realizadas as entregas?
R: As entregas são realizadas via transportadora e o código de rastreio é anexado nos detalhes da sua compra pelo Mercado Livre. Em alguns casos o rastreio pode ficar inválido por um erro técnico entre transportadora e Mercado Livre, porém você poderá acompanhar o envio pelos detalhes da compra.

5 - O produto pode ser retirado?
R: Sim. Todos os nossos produtos podem ser retirados em nosso endereção, o qual será informado pelo chat após a compra. Solicite no campo de perguntas que deseja retirar conosco para que possamos habilitar essa opção.

6 – Vocês podem criar um anúncio com vários produtos diferentes que eu gostaria de comprar tudo junto?
R: Você consegue comprar todos os produtos desejados da nossa loja adicionando-os ao carrinho de compras, assim você só paga um frete e enviamos todos juntos. Basta copiar e colar o link abaixo para acessar todos os produtos da nossa loja. Lembre-se sempre de marcar a opção no campo de pesquisa. Não misture anúncios com envio FULL de anúncios sem o envio FULL, pois saem de lugares diferentes e assim poderá haver a cobrança de frete.

https://eshops.mercadolivre.com.br/w3%20life

7 - O produto acompanha nota fiscal?
R: Toda a mercadoria é acompanhada de nota fiscal emitida para o CPF/CNPJ informado na compra.

Qualquer outra dúvida ficamos à disposição!

name: Coconut Soap 100g X 24 - Native Art
description:
description
WHY BUY AT W3 LIFE?

IMMEDIATE DISPATCH!
Purchases made and with payment released until 1 pm are sent on the same day, after 1 pm they are sent on the morning of the next business day.

LEADING PLATINUM MARKET!
We only work with stock on prompt delivery and provide the best after-sales service.

AUTHORIZED RESELLER!
We only supply original products purchased directly from the manufacturer.

WE ISSUE FISCAL NOTE ON ALL SALES!
There is no point in wanting a better country and evading tax, let alone buying from those who evade. We send invoice on all sales!

STILL IN DOUBT?
Check out the opinion of those who have already bought with us! Just click on “See more data from this seller” below the green reputation bar.

The Arte Nativa Coconut Soap has as main components the vegetable oil of palm kernel and the vegetable oil of coconut, which combined with the active emollients glycerin and sucrose, makes the soap even more hydrating.

Ingredients: Sodium Seboate, Sodium Cocoate, Water, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium, Ethidronic Acid, Buthydroxytoluene, Titanium Dioxide, Coconut Oil, Parfum Fragrance.

Moisturizer;
Antiseptic action;
Antibacterial action;
Cleans the skin;
Pleasant aroma;
Astringent action;
Takes care of skin oils.
Apply the soap on the wet skin, making foam. Then rinse. Use daily.
_____________________________________________________________________

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

1 - Is the merchandise available for immediate delivery?
A: All goods are for prompt delivery.

2 - What is the shipping cost for my zip code?
A: You can automatically calculate on the right side of the screen, below the product price, by clicking on “Calculate delivery time”. There will appear the deadline and the amount of freight to the informed zip code.

3 - Why do you say it's free shipping and you're charging shipping?
A: Mercado Livre changed its free shipping policy, inserting several variables for the calculation of freight such as product weight and size, in addition to the distance between seller and buyer. Thus, purchases over R $ 99.00 will not always have free shipping. We remind you that shipping is calculated automatically by Mercado Livre and we have no control over its value.

4 - How are deliveries made?
A: Deliveries are made via the carrier and the tracking code is attached to the details of your purchase by Mercado Livre. In some cases the tracking may be invalid due to a technical error between the carrier and Mercado Livre, however you will be able to track the shipment by the purchase details.

5 - Can the product be removed?
A: Yes. All of our products can be removed from our address, which will be informed by chat after purchase. Ask in the field of questions you wish to withdraw with us so that we can enable this option.

6 - Can you create an ad with several different products that I would like to buy all together?
A: You can buy all the desired products from our store by adding them to the shopping cart, so you only pay one shipping and we ship them all together. Just copy and paste the link below to access all products from our store. Always remember to check the option “Only in W3 Life” in the search field. Do not mix ads with FULL sending of ads without FULL sending, as they leave different places and so there may be a charge for shipping.

https://eshops.mercadolivre.com.br/w3%20life

7 - Does the product accompany invoice?
A: All merchandise is accompanied by an invoice issued to the CPF / CNPJ informed in the purchase.

Any other questions are available!

The soap is made from juá powder that is extracted from juazeiro, a typical tree from the northeast. It is rich in saponin promoting a natural detergent action, astringent, antiseptic and anti-inflammatory. Therefore, it is common to be used in cosmetics and hygiene products, such as creams, shampoos and toothpaste.

Healing and natural repellent
Indicated for feminine intimate hygiene
